scanner.scanHint: Ayikwazi ukufunda ikhodi ye-QR — zama ukuthumela kabusha noma usondele
scanner.cameraPermissionDenied: Imvume yekhamera yenqatshiwe — thepha ukuze uvule izilungiselelo

app.title: Ghost Auth
app.subtitle: Isiqinisekisi se-open-source
app.refreshCodesFailed: Yehlulekile ukuvuselela amakhodi — hlola ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lunokufinyelela kugciniwe

accountCard.clipboardClearFailed: Ayikwazanga ukususa i-clipboard — sicela ususe mathupha
accountCard.srHint: Cindezela u-E ukuze uhlele, u-Delete ukuze ususe

addAccount.title: > Engeza i-akhawunti
addAccount.scanQrDesc: Sebenzisa ikhamera ukuskena ikhodi ye-QR yokuqinisekisa
addAccount.invalidQr: Ikhodi ye-QR engalungile — bekulindeleke i-otpauth:// URI
addAccount.importFromAppDesc: Ngenisa ama-akhawunti kusuka ku-app yokuqinisekisa enye

help.title: Usizo
help.introDesc: Konke okudingeka ukukwazi ngokuvumelanisa, izipele, nokugcina ama-akhawunti akho ephephile.
help.syncDesc: I-Ghost Auth ivumelanisa amakhodi akho phakathi kwamadivayisi ngokuxhumana okuqondile okubethelwe. Amadivayisi omabili kumele abe kunethiwekhi efanayo.
help.syncStep1: Edivayisini enezimfihlo onokuzabelana ngazo, iya ku-Izilungiselelo → Vumelanisa kusuka kule divayisi. Lokhu kuzobonisa ikhodi ye-QR.
help.syncStep2: Edivayisini ofuna ukwamukela amakhodi kuyo, iya ku-Izilungiselelo → Vumelanisa kule divayisi bese uskena ikhodi ye-QR.
help.syncNote: Ukuvumelanisa akwenzeki ngokuzenzakalelayo. Njalo uma wengeza, uhlela, noma ususa ama-akhawunti, udinga ukuvumelanisa futhi ukugcina amadivayisi akho amanye ebuyekeziwe.
help.importDesc: Ungakwazi ukungenisa amakhodi akho akhona kusuka kuma-app okuqinisekisa njenge-Google Authenticator, Authy, Microsoft Authenticator, nokunye.
help.importStep1Title: Isinyathelo 1 — Thumela kusuka ku-app yakho yamanje
help.importStep1: Ku-app yakho yokuqinisekisa yamanje, bheka inketho yokuthumela noma yokudlulisa. Lokhu ngokuvamile kukhiqiza ikhodi ye-QR noma ifayela lokuthumela elinezinhla zakho.
help.importStep2: Iya ku-Izilungiselelo → Ngenisa kusuka ku-app. Skena ikhodi ye-QR evela ku-app yakho endala, noma ukhethe ifayela lokuthumela. Ama-akhawunti akho azongezwa ku-Ghost Auth.
help.backupExportDesc: Iya ku-Izilungiselelo → Thumela isipele ukulondoloza ifayela elibethelwe elinayo yonke ama-akhawunti akho. Gcina leli fayela endaweni ephephile ebethelwe oyikhethile — njengomlawuli wamagama emfihlo, idrayivu ebethelwe, noma isitoreji seklaudi esiphephile.
help.backupImportDesc: Iya ku-Izilungiselelo → Ngenisa isipele bese ukhetha ifayela lakho lesipele olithumele ngaphambilini. Ama-akhawunti akho azobuyiselwa.
help.backupNote: Sincoma kakhulu ukuthumela izipele njalo, ikakhulukazi ngaphambi kokwenza izinguquko kuma-akhawunti akho. Izipele njengamanje zigcinwe ngokwendawo — azihostwe kumaseva e-Ghost Auth. Ama-akhawunti abasebenzisi nezipele ezizenzakalelayo zingaba khona esikhathini esizayo.
help.forgotPinDesc1: Uma ukhohlwe i-PIN yakho, ungasebenzisa enye yamakhodi okubuyisela anikwa ngenkathi usetha i-PIN yakho okokuqala. Ikhodi ngayinye yokubuyisela ingasetshenziswa kanye kuphela.
help.forgotPinDesc2: Uma ungasenawo amakhodi okubuyisela, akukho indlela yokuvula uhlelo lokusebenza. Inketho yakho ekuphela kwayo ukufaka kabusha i-Ghost Auth bese ungenisa ifayela lesipele elinezinhla zakho zangaphambilini.
help.lostDeviceDesc: Uma ulahlekelwe yidivayisi yakho, faka i-Ghost Auth edivayisini entsha bese ungenisa ifayela lesipele. Uma ubuvumelanise ama-akhawunti akho kwelinye idivayisi, ungavumelanisa nokusuka kulelo divayisi.
help.accessWarning: I-Ghost Auth ayinawo ama-akhawunti abasebenzisi futhi ayinaso isitoreji seseva. Uma ulahlekelwa ngokufinyelela okuphelele kuhlelo lokusebenza futhi ungenalo ifayela lesipele noma idivayisi evumelanisiwe, ukubuyisela amakhodi akho e-TOTP akunakwenzeka. Thumela izipele njalo futhi uzigcine ngokuphephile.

about.title: > Mayelana
about.heading: Ghost Auth
about.description: I-Ghost Auth isiqinisekisi samahhala, se-open-source. Izimfihlo zakho zibethelwe ngokwendawo futhi azisoze zaphuma edivayisini yakho.

importExternal.title: > Ngenisa kusuka ku-app
importExternal.scanQrDesc: Skena ikhodi ye-QR yokuthumela ye-Google Authenticator
importExternal.importFileDesc: Aegis, 2FAS, AndOTP, Google Authenticator, otpauth:// URI
importExternal.supportedFormats: Isekela i-Aegis, 2FAS, AndOTP, Google Authenticator, namafayela e-otpauth:// URI.
importExternal.allExist: Wonke ama-akhawunti asevele ekhona ku-Ghost Auth.
importExternal.invalidQr: Ikhodi ye-QR engalungile — bekulindeleke ikhodi ye-QR yokuqinisekisa yokuthumela

backupExport.title: > Thumela isipele
backupExport.description: Isipele sakho sizobethelwa ngale password. Uzoyidinga ukubuyisela.
backupExport.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe nezinhlamvu okungenani ezi-8

backupImport.title: > Ngenisa isipele
backupImport.allExist: Wonke ama-akhawunti asevele ekhona ku-Ghost Auth.

syncJoin.title: > Vumelanisa kule divayisi
syncJoin.scanQrDesc: Skena ikhodi ye-QR eboniswe kwelinye idivayisi
syncJoin.invalidSyncQr: Ikhodi ye-QR engalungile — akuyona ikhodi yokuvumelanisa ye-Ghost auth
syncJoin.missingSyncData: Ikhodi ye-QR yokuvumelanisa engalungile — idatha yokuxhumana ayikho
syncJoin.badPort: Ikhodi ye-QR yokuvumelanisa engalungile — iphothi engalungile

biometricPrompt.title: Ukuvula nge-biometric
biometricPrompt.description: Sebenzisa i-Face ID noma umunwe ukuvula i-Ghost Auth ngokushesha

recoveryCodes.title: Amakhodi okubuyisela
recoveryCodes.description: Londoloza la makhodi endaweni ephephile. Awasoze aboniswa futhi. Ikhodi ngayinye ingasetshenziswa kanye kuphela.

setup.heading: > Ghost Auth
setup.description: Setha iphasiwedi enkulu ukuze ubhale ngokufihlekile isafe yakho
setup.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kumele ibe nezinhlamvu okungenani ezingu-8

settings.autoLockNeverDesc: Isafe ihlala ivulekile kuze kuvale isiphequluli
settings.autoLockDesc: Isafe iyazikhiya ngemva kwemizuzu engu-{minutes} yokungasebenzi
settings.passwordlessEnabledHint: Thepha ukuze uvimbe ukuvula ngaphandle kwephasiwedi
settings.passwordlessWarningDesc: Lokhu kuzogcina ukhiye wesafe ngaphandle kokubhala ngokufihlekile. Noma ubani ofinyelela iphrofayili yakho yesiphequluli angabona zonke ama-akhawunti nezimfihlo.
settings.lockPinDesc: Khiya manje futhi udinge i-PIN ukuze uvule kabusha
settings.lockPasswordDesc: Khiya manje futhi udinge iphasiwedi ukuze uvule kabusha
settings.syncFromDeviceDesc: Xhuma kukhompyutha noma ifoni ngenethiwekhi yangaphakathi

sync.title: > Vumelanisa kusuka kudivayisi
sync.instructions: Vula i-Ghost Auth kudivayisi yakho enye, yana ezilungiselelweni, bese uthepha "sync to extension". Faka ikhodi yokuvumelanisa nekheli eliboniswa lapho.

help.title: > Usizo
help.syncingDesc: Vumelanisa ama-akhawunti akho kusuka ku-app ye-Ghost Auth yekhompyutha noma yefoni ngokuxhuma okuqondile okubhaliwe ngokufihlekile. Womabili amadivayisi kumele abe kunethiwekhi efanayo.
help.syncingStep: Ku-app yakho, yana Izilungiselelo → Vumelanisa kusuka kule divayisi. Bese kulesi singezo, yana Izilungiselelo → Vumelanisa kusuka kudivayisi bese ufaka ikhodi yokuvumelanisa.
help.syncingNote: Ukuvumelanisa kwenziwa ngesandla — phinda njalo uma ungeza noma ushintsha ama-akhawunti ku-app.
help.backupsExport: Thumela ifayela yesipele ye-.ghostauth ebhaliwe ngokufihlekile kusuka Izilungiselelo → Thumela isipele. Igcine endaweni ephephile.
help.backupsImport: Ngenisa isipele kusuka Izilungiselelo → Ngenisa isipele. Izipele ziyahambisana phakathi kwe-app nesingezo.
help.masterPasswordDesc: Isafe yakho ibhaliwe ngokufihlekile ngephasiwedi enkulu. Le phasiwedi ayiphumi esipheqululini sakho futhi ayinakubuyiswa.
help.masterPasswordWarning: Uma ukhohlwa iphasiwedi yakho enkulu, uzodinga ukufaka kabusha isingezo bese ungenisa isipele noma uvumelanise kusuka ku-app.
help.pinRecoveryDesc: Ukukhiya nge-PIN okukhethekayo kwengeza isendlalelo sokuvula ngokushesha phezu kwephasiwedi enkulu. Amakhodi okubuyisa anikezwa uma usetha i-PIN — wacinge endaweni ephephile.
help.pinRecoveryNote: Uma ukhohlwa i-PIN yakho futhi ungenamakhodi okubuyisa, khiya isafe ngesandla (vala bese uvula kabusha isiphequluli) bese usebenzisa iphasiwedi yakho enkulu esikhundleni.
help.losingAccessDesc: I-Ghost Auth ayinama-akhawunti abasebenzisi noma isitoreji seseva. Uma ulahlekelwa ukufinyelela kokubili isingezo ne-app ngaphandle kwefayela yesipele, ukubuyisa amakhodi akho e-TOTP akunakwenzeka. Thumela izipele njalo.

backupImport.accountsFound: Ama-akhawunti angu-{count} atholakele. Amakhophi afanayo azokwedlulwa.

exportQr.title: > Thumela amakhodi e-QR
exportQr.description: Skena nge-app yokuqinisekisa enye ukuze ungenise lama-akhawunti
